product_name: Blackburn Local Saddle Bag Panniers - Pair
long_description: Tough carryalls for work, school, shopping or wherever you pedal, the Blackburn Local Saddle Bag Panniers offer plenty of room and a removable shoulder strap for easy transport to and from the bike. Panniers feature a roomy interiors, loops for a flashing light on either side (light not included), and a reflective print. Compatible with all standard bike racks. When used with a Blackburn Interlock Bike Rack (sold separately), the Blackburn Local Saddle Bag Panniers can be secured on the bike with a single key.
short_description: Tough carryalls for work, school, shopping or wherever you pedal, the Blackburn Local Saddle Bag Panniers offer plenty of room and a removable shoulder strap for easy transport to and from the bike.
